turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place an order for pickup at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a venti caramel macchiato with no foam and whole milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok Google.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you want a venti caramel macchiato with whole milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, i'll add that to the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which starbucks would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in 195 in Manchester.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me send your order there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I'd say thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a venti caramel macchiato with whole milk and no foam to be picked up at the starbucks on 195th and manchester, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you very much. No, it's good. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.
